mysite

Record FBX animations in Play mode

Use the Recorder package (version 4.0.0 or higher) in addition to the FBX Exporter package to record the animation of a GameObject in Play mode and export it as an FBX animation.

Section Description
Record FBX animations via the Recorder window Use the Recorder window to record a GameObject's animation to FBX within an arbitrary time or frame interval in Play mode.
Record FBX animations via a Timeline Recorder Track Set up one or multiple Recorder clips in a Timeline Recorder Track to activate the recording of a GameObject's animations to FBX at specific time or frame intervals in Play mode.
FBX Recorder properties Get the description of all properties available when you record an FBX animation in Play mode via the Recorder window or a Recorder clip in Timeline.
